sql.where:
and (title like '%${searchData}%' or content like '%${searchData}%')
and (title like '%${searchData}%' or content like '%${searchData}%' or writer like '%${searchData}%')
and ${searchOption} like '%${searchData}%'
and categoryName=#{category}

mapper.insert: insert into board (title, content, writer, pwd,fileNo,memberNo) values (#{title}, #{content}, #{writer}, #{pwd},#{fileNo},#{memberNo})
mapper.select: select * from board order by regdate desc

select no, title, content, writer, pwd, fileNo, hit, boardView.like, regDate, memberNo, commentCount from boardView
order by regdate desc limit #{offSet}, #{conPerPage}
select no from board where fileNo=#{fileNo}
mapper.update: update board set board.like=(board.like+1) where no=#{boardNo}
update board set dislike=(dislike+1) where no=#{boardNo}
